filter.name: ready
filter.help: Stock moves that are Available (Ready to process)

filter.name: future
filter.help: Stock moves that are Confirmed, Available or Waiting

filter.name: future_dates
filter.help: Stock moves that are Confirmed, Available or Waiting (For stock move dates menu)

filter.name: done
filter.help: Stock moves that have been processed
Orders processed Today or planned for Today

tree.decoration-danger: state not in ('cancel','done') and date > current_date

field.name: help
field.p: Click to create a stock movement.
This menu gives you the full traceability of inventory operations on a specific product. You can filter on the product to see all the past or future movements for the product.
